solution_line_template: The number of students who wish to go on the skiing trip is {multiplier_skiing} * {students_scavenger_hunt} students = <<{multiplier_skiing}*{students_scavenger_hunt}={students_skiing_trip}>>{students_skiing_trip} students.
The total number of students is {students_scavenger_hunt} students + {students_skiing_trip} students = <<{students_scavenger_hunt}+{students_skiing_trip}={total_students}>>{total_students} students.
